name: The House My Grandfather Built
description:
An inherited house, an escape from the world.

This is the game The House My Grandfather Built.

You're isolated from the world around you as you play as Leah, a girl who recently inherited her granfather's house. Join her as she repairs and rebuilds the house to how she remembers it and go through a short journey of reflection.

Choose the building style, listen to her story and follow along in a cosy atmosphere as she finds herself in the house she's building.
